articles.description: Pep Guardiola says his Man City side are "fragile", while they are also labelled "weak" and "frail" after surrendering a 3-0 Champions League lead against Feyenoord at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Man City 3-3 Feyenoord: Pep Guardiola's side 'fragile', 'weak' and 'frail' after draw

articles.description: Arsenal get back to winning ways in the Champions League with a commanding victory over Sporting at Estadio Jose Alvalade.
articles.title: Sporting 1-5 Arsenal: Bukayo Saka stars as Gunners get back to winning ways in Champions League

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes says he understands if the decision to bat Jacob Bethell at number three "does raise a few eyebrows", but insists "we're not picking people just to wind people up".
articles.title: Jacob Bethell: Ben Stokes explains England selection of 21-year-old

articles.description: After Marnus Labuschagne's failures in the first Test with India, BBC Sport examines his slump and the issues with Australia's other batters.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Marnus Labuschagne to be axed for second Test?

articles.description: Inter Milan win their fourth Champions League game in a row with a narrow victory over winless RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Inter Milan 1-0 RB Leipzig: Castello Lukeba scores own goal

articles.description: Robert Lewandowski becomes the third player to score 100 Champions League goals as Barcelona overcome Brest in a dominant display.
articles.title: Barcelona 3-0 Brest: Robert Lewandowski scores 100th Champions League goal

articles.description: Miami Dolphins star Tyreek Hill had his case dismissed after the officer failed to show in court.
articles.title: Traffic ticket dropped for NFL star Tyreek Hill, who was handcuffed before game

articles.description: After an autumn in which progress seemed to stall, which areas do England need to focus most attention on before the Six Nations?
articles.title: England's to-do list for Six Nations: Defence, Marcus Smith and more

articles.description: Napoli might sell Manchester United target Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, Real Madrid target Tottenham's Pedro Porro and Brighton make Evan Ferguson available for loan, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Kvaratskhelia, Porro, Ferguson, Hernandez

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola reacts after his side are booed following their 3-3 draw against Feyenoord in the Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League: Pep Guardiola reacts to boos after Man City draw against Feyenoord
